sentences.en: "What do you want, Roy? If it's money, you're out of luck."
sentences.cn: “你想要什么，罗伊？要钱的话，那你别指望了。”

sentences.en: &B{good luck with} your studies!.
sentences.cn: 祝你学习进步！。

sentences.en: as luck would have it, his route took him very near where they lived.
sentences.cn: 碰巧他走的路线离他们的住所很近。

sentences.en: Good luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it.
sentences.cn: 好运就是当机会来临时，你早已做好了准备。

sentences.en: He does deserve some good luck after so much wretchedness.
sentences.cn: 经过这么多苦难之后，他应该行点好运了。

sentences.en: He kissed her on the cheek. "Best of luck!"
sentences.cn: 他吻了吻她的脸颊。“祝你好运！”

sentences.en: he thought he'd &B{try his luck at} farming in Canada.
sentences.cn: 他想碰碰运气去加拿大办农场。

sentences.en: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.cn: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

sentences.en: I have to go to secretarial school, worse luck.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我不得不去秘书学校。

sentences.en: I set off for the valley, trusting to luck.
sentences.cn: 我动身去山谷了，一切全凭运气。

sentences.en: I wear this crystal under my costume for luck.
sentences.cn: 我贴身戴着块水晶，希望它能带给我好运。

sentences.en: It didn't rain, which turned out to be a stroke of luck.
sentences.cn: 天没下雨，结果成了件幸事。

sentences.en: It was an incredible piece of luck.
sentences.cn: 真是令人难以置信的好运气。

sentences.en: It was jolly hard luck on him, wasn't it?
sentences.cn: 他可真倒霉，不是吗？

sentences.en: It would be just his luck to miss the last boat.
sentences.cn: 他就这运气，误了最后一班船也毫不出奇。

sentences.en: Jean was extremely superstitious and believed the colour green brought bad luck.
sentences.cn: 琼非常迷信，认为绿色会带来厄运。

sentences.en: quality of care depends largely on the luck of the draw.
sentences.cn: 照料的好坏在很大程度上取决于运气。

sentences.en: Roulette is a game of luck.
sentences.cn: 轮盘赌是个靠运气的游戏。

sentences.en: She was going to try her luck at the Las Vegas casinos.
sentences.cn: 她打算去拉斯韦加斯的赌场碰碰运气。

sentences.en: The Sri Lankans have been having no luck with the weather.
sentences.cn: 斯里兰卡人在天气方面运气一直很差。

sentences.en: Their luck had simply run out. Still, never fear.
sentences.cn: 他们的好运已经到头了。不过，别担心。

sentences.en: Was he born to be successful, or did he just luck out?
sentences.cn: 是他命中注定会成功，还是仅仅交了好运？

sentences.en: We had a bit of hard luck this season.
sentences.cn: 我们本季运气不太好。

sentences.en: with luck we should be there in time for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 如果一切顺利的话，我们可以到达那里赶上吃早餐。

sentences.en: Wood has not had much luck in carving out a career.
sentences.cn: 伍德想干出点名堂来，可是总不能如愿。

sentences.en: You’re not having much luck today, are you?
sentences.cn: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

phrases.tran_cn: 新手的好运气（体育比赛、游戏、赌博、渔猎等）；狗屎运
为了吉利；为了祈求好运
幸运的：享受成功的；幸运的

phrases.phrase: with (any 或 a bit of) luck

trans.tran_en: good things that happen to you by chance
